text: Xupma sing thi phwk khea bricakh pi nı chiwit khwam pen xyu hæng lok ni nan dang xupmiy lm sung mi khwam yen cad di prasb kæ phuch phl khxng phwk k hnung thi xthrrm kætaw xeng læw di thalay phuch phl nan xallxhˌ nan midi thrng xthrrm kæ phwk khea tæthwa phwk khea xthrrm kætaw khxng phwk khea xeng
